example.question: A student researches the occurrence of attached versus unattached earlobes in his family. Which potential title will best reflect the contents of the report?

prompt:
Accurately answer the following question:

A student researches the occurrence of attached versus unattached earlobes in his family. Which potential title will best reflect the contents of the report?

Choices:
A. Conformity of Earlobe Types
B. Earlobe Type and Biology
C. Heredity of Earlobe Types
D. Earlobe Type and Protein Formation


Instructions:
- Carefully read the question and all options.
- Select the single most correct answer.
- Respond ONLY in the following format: "The correct answer is A/B/C/D".
- Do not include any explanations, additional text, or punctuation besides the answer.
